args.info: The identifier of the object to be copied.

docs.name: ZigZag.ZigZag.new

args.info: The identifier of the object to be copied.
args.name: object

docs.desc:
Returns the last `Pivot` object from a `ZigZag` instance if it contains at
least one `Pivot`, and `na` otherwise.
Can be used as a function or method.
docs.name: ZigZag.lastPivot

docs.desc:
Returns the last `Pivot` object from a `ZigZag` instance if it contains at
least one `Pivot`, and `na` otherwise.
Can be used as a function or method.
docs.name: ZigZag.lastPivot

docs.desc:
Updates a `ZigZag` objects with new pivots, volume, lines, and labels.
NOTE: This function must be called on every bar for accurate calculations.
Can be used as a function or method.
docs.name: ZigZag.update
docs.returnType:
(bool) `true` when a new pivot point is registered and the `ZigZag` is updated,
`false` otherwise.

docs.desc:
Updates a `ZigZag` objects with new pivots, volume, lines, and labels.
NOTE: This function must be called on every bar for accurate calculations.
Can be used as a function or method.
docs.name: ZigZag.update
docs.returnType:
(bool) `true` when a new pivot point is registered and the `ZigZag` is updated,
`false` otherwise.

docs.desc:
Instantiates a new `ZigZag` object with optional `settings`.
If no `settings` are provided, creates a `ZigZag` object with default settings.
docs.name: ZigZag.newInstance

docs.desc: Provides calculation and display properties to `ZigZag` objects.

fields.desc: The minimum percentage deviation from a point before the `ZigZag` changes direction.
fields.name: devThreshold

fields.desc: The number of bars required for pivot detection.
fields.name: depth

fields.desc: The color of each line drawn by the `ZigZag`.
fields.name: lineColor

fields.desc: A condition allowing a line to connect the most recent pivot with the current close.
fields.name: extendLast

fields.desc: A condition to display the pivot price in the pivot label.
fields.name: displayReversalPrice

fields.desc: A condition to display the cumulative volume for the pivot segment in the pivot label.
fields.name: displayCumulativeVolume

fields.desc: A condition to display the change in price or percent from the previous pivot in each pivot label.
fields.name: displayReversalPriceChange

fields.desc: The reversal change display mode. Options are "Absolute" or "Percent".
fields.name: differencePriceMode

fields.desc: A condition to determine whether the `ZigZag` displays lines and labels.
fields.name: draw

fields.desc: A condition to allow double pivots i.e., when a large bar makes both a pivot high and a pivot low.
fields.name: allowZigZagOnOneBar

docs.name: ZigZag.Settings

docs.desc: Represents a significant level that indicates directional movement or potential support and resistance.

fields.desc: A `line` object connecting the `start` and `end` chart points.
fields.name: ln

fields.desc: A `label` object to display pivot values.
fields.name: lb

fields.desc: A condition to determine whether the pivot is a pivot high.
fields.name: isHigh

fields.desc: The cumulative volume for the pivot segment.
fields.name: vol

fields.desc: A `chart.point` object representing the coordinates of the previous point.
fields.name: start

fields.desc: A `chart.point` object representing the coordinate of the current point.
fields.name: end

docs.name: ZigZag.Pivot

docs.desc: An object to maintain a Zig Zag's settings, pivots, and cumulative volume.

fields.desc: A `Settings` object to provide calculation and display properties.
fields.name: settings

fields.desc: An array of `Pivot` objects.
fields.name: pivots

fields.desc: The volume sum for the current `Pivot` object's line segment.
fields.name: sumVol

fields.desc: A `Pivot` object used to project a line from the last pivot point to the current bar.
fields.name: extend

docs.name: ZigZag.ZigZag
